ocrd-page-transform.description: apply arbitrary XSL transformation file for PAGE-XML

xsl.description: File path of the XSL transformation script

xslt-params.description: Assignment of XSL transformation parameter values, given as in `xmlstarlet` (which differentiates between `-s name=value` for literal `value` and `-p name=value` for XPath expression `value`), white-space separated.
